channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform

item.title: CVE-2024-28165|2024-05-14T03:51:20.267Z -- SAP_SE -- SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform
item.description: SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform is vulnerable to stored XSS allowing an attacker to manipulate a parameter in the Opendocument URL which could lead to high impact on Confidentiality and Integrity of the application
